main.java.indexer.shared.communication

Class ClientCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.indexer.shared.communication.ClientCommunicator

  • public class ClientCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
    The ClientCommunicator class is the class shared in order to communicate between the server and the client.

    • Method Detail

      • ValidateUser

        public ValidateUser_Result ValidateUser(ValidateUser_Params params)
        Validates user credentials.
        Parameters:
        params - An object with the username and password of the user to validate.
        Returns:
        The user object if succesful, false if the username or password is invalid, and failed if any error occurs.

      • getProjects

        public GetProjects_Result getProjects(GetProjects_Params params)
        Returns information about all of the available projects
        Parameters:
        params - An object with the username and password
        Returns:
        An object with all available projects if successful, otherwise the word failed.

      • getSampleImage

        public GetSampleImage_Result getSampleImage(GetSampleImage_Params params)
        Returns a sample image for the specified project.
        Parameters:
        params - A object with the username and password and project id of the desired sample image.
        Returns:
        An object with the file url if successful, otherwise the word failed.

      • downloadBatch

        public DownloadBatch_Result downloadBatch(DownloadBatch_Params params)
        Assigns and downloads a batch for the user to index if the user doesn't already have a batch assigned to them.
        Parameters:
        params - An object with the username and password of the user and the projectId of the desired batch
        Returns:
        An object with the new batch if succesful. Otherwise the word failed.

      • submitBatch

        public SubmitBatch_Result submitBatch(SubmitBatch_Params params)
        Submits the indexed record field values for a batch to the Server. Unassigns the User from the given batch and increments the Users indexed record count.
        Parameters:
        params - An object with the username and password of the user and the record value to be submited.
        Returns:
        An object with the word true if succesful, otherwise the word failed.

      • getFields

        public GetFields_Result getFields(GetFields_Params params)
        Returns information about all of the fields for the specified project If no project is specified, returns information about all of the fields for all projects in the system.
        Parameters:
        params - An object with the username and password of the user and the optional project id.
        Returns:
        An object containing the desired fields if succesful, otherwise the word failed.

      • search

        public Search_Result search(Search_Params params)
        Searches the indexed records for the specified strings .
        Parameters:
        params - An object with the username and password of the user, a list of strings to search for and fields to search.
        Returns:
        An object with a list of search result objects which contains the batchId, Image URL, Record Number, and Field ID that match the search criteria.

      • downloadFile

        public java.lang.Byte[] downloadFile(java.lang.String url)
        Downloads and returns the bytes for the requested file.
        Parameters:
        url - The url of the file to download.
        Returns:
        The bytes of the requested file.
